_sText:
File Name: cs_newyork_sn
File Size: 14.7 MB approx. (un-zipped/RARed)
Custom Models and Textures: Yes (embedded in the bsp file)

DESCRIPTION:

****NEW YORK SIEGE****
ONCE AGAIN the phoenix terrorist cell has taken control of the DSB Computer Solutions building in downtown New York, only this time its in the middle of a ferocious New York blizzard. In considerably similar circumstances,the terrorists have taken four DSB employees hostage in the second conference room situated in the south building. 

Terrorists: Prevent the oncoming counter-terrorist assault by all means necessary; do not let the hostages escape.

Counter-Terrorists: Rescue all 4 hostages and take out all enemies. Proceed with extreme caution.



*******CONTACT INFO******** 
If you have any problems please contact me on msn at happyapple_42@hotmail.com
Be sure to visit the New York site for information on future mapping projects.
http://geocities.com/cs_newyork_sn

YOU MAY upload to any website, SO LONG as full credit is given AND that I am notified through the above email address. Thank You.
